title: DiShuiFong - Water Drop Teahouse
description: Vegetarian restaurant located on the ground floor of a buddhist institute building. Spacious, fine, and serene environment. Offers appetizers from NT50+, main dishes from NT100-250, coffee and tea from NT50+. Most food items are vegan, though a few dishes contain dairy, so vegans to specify. Bus your own table when finished. Has parking underground.
